Giant's Minion Hadel: Einhasad said that the spirit of rebirth of Hermuncus will be in the Forest of the Dead. Monsters will try to obtain the parts of his hands. Urgently go to the *Forest of the Dead* and Collect all the pieces of the hands of Hermuncus. Hunt down *Corrupted Guards*, *Corrupted Knights*, *Resurrected Knights* and *Vampire Warriors*.
